name: SketchBook Pro Animation File
summary: Learn about .SKBA files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To create a SKBA Flipbook animation file, select File → New Flipbook, add your content, and save the file. You can also export your animation to a series of images or a single image to share your animation with a person not running SketchBook. To do this, select Export Flipbook → All Frames or Export Flipbook → Current Frame.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
